fixes.name: Calculation2

fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: Returns the DeptID value for each row (direct column pass-through).

fixes.name: dep calc 2

fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation performs row-level arithmetic using columns from the same row, so it should be a calculated column.

fixes.name: dep calc 3
fixes.solution_explanation: Aggregates the dep calc 2 values across the table using SUM.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.

fixes.name: Calculation3
